text:
I wasn't sure what I would like to do after my laster year in high schlool. I was interest by many things, maybe to many. I wanted to became a cynophil agent and a horse teacher at the same time.  But during my scolarity I spend a lot of my personnal time in my stables. I was helping my coach with horses but also for the lesson with the childs. I spend all my holidays with them. And I started develop relationship with all the kids. I was able to take care of my own group, give lesson and take them out for a ride. I really enjoyed develop a complicity with all of them. At the same time, on my social media I discovered many teacher that I started follow. They was talking about their classes, the child but also about education and the better way to give to the students knowledge.  They explicated many time that the actual education system doesn't work. These teachers showed many statistics from scientists to prove what they was saying. I found this really interessant. Few months later I started looking for my after high school. This is how I discovered the science of education. It's a really new licence. After all I learned thanks to my social media, I thought it was a good idea for me to start my study in this domain.
It's not really a person or a situation but all of this who give the inspiration for this licence. I'm not really sure of what to do next, but I still have time to think about it.
